abstract: Fiat Chrysler is recalling about 350,000 Journey sport utility vehicles, including about 144,000 in United States, due to defect that could cause fire.
lead_paragraph: Fiat Chrysler is recalling about 350,000 Journey sport utility vehicles because a plastic engine cover could come loose, contact a hot exhaust and cause a fire.

headline.main: Fire Risk Prompts Fiat Chrysler to Recall 350,000 Vehicles
headline.print_headline: Fire Risk Prompts Fiat Chrysler to Recall 350,000 Vehicles

snippet: Fiat Chrysler is recalling about 350,000 Journey sport utility vehicles because a plastic engine cover could come loose, contact a hot exhaust and cause a fire.
